text: "If You Tolerate This Your Children Will Be Next" is a 1998 song by Welsh band Manic Street Preachers and is the leading single from their fifth studio album This Is My Truth Tell Me Yours. It went number 1 in Iceland and the United Kingdom, number 3 in Ireland and Scotland, number 19 in Norway, number 21 in Sweden, number 44 in New Zealand, number 49 in Australia, number 62 in the Netherlands and number 79 in Germany. ==Track listings== All music was written by James Dean Bradfield and Sean Moore except where indicated. All lyrics were written by Nick Jones except where indicated. ==References== Category:1998 songs Category:1990s ballads Category:Rock ballads Category:Alternative rock songs Category:Manic Street Preachers songs
title: If You Tolerate This Your Children Will Be Next
